title: April's fool didn't fool nobody.
body:
It's the same thing every year. URF mode. Wow what a surprise, that's totally not what we had for several years an will keep having for several more years! 
While other major gaming companies are always keeping you on your toes and surprised for April's Fool, you can always know what Riot is going to do: URF mode and skins.

replies.body: Um, URF mode started last year, and actually was just an April Fools joke at first. It got such overwhelming positive feedback that they kept it around as an official Featured Game Mode rather than just a one-off silly thing as they'd intended.

Poor guy, i bet he came back to his thread to see all the responses.
At that moment he felt more wrong than anyone else in the world.

Literally one year

Literally only around because everyone wanted it back

OP is autist confirmed

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=zwVHE4G0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-02T18:47:46.815+0000)
>
> Literally one year
> 
> Literally only around because everyone wanted in back
> 
> OP is autist confirmed

What the actual fuck does Autism have to do with this?  Ignorant little git.
Maybe he was typing in a new york accent?

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=zwVHE4G0,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-04-02T18:52:02.781+0000)
>
> Learn how to internet.

The internet is not an excuse to offend vast groups of people, no matter how many people tell you it is. Autism and asberger's aren't punch lines.

Asbergers isnt

Autism most certainly is atm

Whether or not its right doesn't change that its a punchline xDxDxD

Edit: The auto correct for asbergers is Beefburgers. What the fuck
I knows lots bout the interwebs. I , along with Al Gore, Invented it.
I for one, do not want anything "in back" ... Just sayin
How long have you been playing? < 12 months? It happened only once, 12 months ago. "Several years?" What game do you think this is, WoW?

According to you, One year = every year.

You either need to re-learn English or Math.

it started last year

And it did fool a lot of people, we expected to get urf, than riot fooled us with nurf, but it was urf all along

>It's the same thing every year.

it's only the second year URF is around ?
